trans-unit.target: BlinkRate 必須為零或大於零。不允許使用負值。

trans-unit.source: Enables the automatic handling of text that extends beyond the width of the button.
trans-unit.target: 啟用自動處理，以處理超出按鈕寬度的文字。

trans-unit.source: For buttons whose FlatStyle is FlatStyle.Flat, this property specifies the color of the border around the button.

trans-unit.source: For buttons whose FlatStyle is FlatStyle.Flat, this property specifies the size, in pixels, of the border around the button.

trans-unit.source: For buttons whose FlatStyle is FlatStyle.Flat, this property specifies the color of the client area of the button when the button is checked and the mouse pointer is outside the bounds of the control.
trans-unit.target: 若按鈕的 FlatStyle 是 FlatStyle.Flat，此屬性會指定當核取按鈕且滑鼠指標位於控制界限外時，按鈕工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: For buttons whose FlatStyle is FlatStyle.Flat, this property specifies the color of the client area of the button when the mouse pointer is within the bounds of the control.
trans-unit.target: 若按鈕的 FlatStyle 是 FlatStyle.Flat，此屬性會指定當滑鼠指標位於控制界限內時，按鈕工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Desktop applications are required to opt in to all earlier accessibility improvements to get the later improvements. To do this, ensure that if the AppContext switch 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.N' is set to 'false', then 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures' and all 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.M' switches, when M < N, evaluate to false as well. Note that, if a switch for a particular set of accessibility improvements is not present, its value is determined by the target framework version. You can remedy this by adding these switches and setting their value to false.
trans-unit.target: 傳統型應用程式必須加入所有較舊的協助工具改進，才能取得較新的改進。如果要這麼做，請確認 AppContext 參數 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.N' 是否設定為 'false'，然後確認 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures' 與所有 'Switch.UseLegacyAccessibilityFeatures.M' 參數，當 M < N 時，也同樣評估為 'false'。請注意，若未提供一組特定協助工具改進的參數，其值將取決於目標 Framework 版本。您可以新增這些參數並將其值設定為 false 來解決此問題。

trans-unit.source: The autocomplete custom source, which is a custom StringCollection used when the AutoCompleteSource is CustomSource.
trans-unit.target: 自動完成的自訂來源，此為當 AutoCompleteSource 是 CustomSource 時所用的自訂 StringCollection。

trans-unit.target: 當 DropDownStyle 是 ComboBoxStyle.DropDownList 而且 AutoCompleteMode 不是 AutoCompleteMode.None 時，只能使用 AutoCompleteSource.ListItems 值。

trans-unit.target: 無法將選取的資料列加入或插入 DataGridView 控制項。必須先取消選取資料列。

trans-unit.target: 無法刪除未經認可的新資料列。

trans-unit.target: 當 DataGridView 控制項已資料繫結至支援變更告知且允許刪除的 IBindingList 以外的任何項目時，無法用程式設計的方式清除資料列集合。

trans-unit.source: Rows cannot be programmatically removed unless the DataGridView is data-bound to an IBindingList that supports change notification and allows deletion.
trans-unit.target: 除非 DataGridView 已資料繫結至支援變更告知且允許刪除的 IBindingList，否則無法用程式設計的方式移除資料列。

trans-unit.target: DataGridView 的框線樣式。

trans-unit.target: 按鈕儲存格上顯示的預設文字。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: 表示 DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text 屬性值是否顯示為此資料行中儲存格的按鈕文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of a DataGridView control is true and a row edit should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控制項的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 屬性為 true，且應取消資料列編輯時發生。

trans-unit.source: Visible column cannot be added because its AutoSize mode is Fill, and the column is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入可見資料行，因為它的自動調整模式是 Fill，但資料行已經凍結。

trans-unit.source: Visible column cannot be added because its AutoSize mode includes its header, and the column headers are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入可見資料行，因為它的自動調整模式包含行首，但資料行行首是不可見的。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added because it is frozen and placed after an unfrozen column.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入資料行，因為它已經凍結但卻放在未凍結的資料行後面。

trans-unit.source: Row cannot be added because it is frozen and placed after an unfrozen row.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入資料列，因為它已經凍結但卻放在未凍結的資料列後面。

trans-unit.source: At least two provided columns are identical. Each provided column must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 提供的資料行中至少有兩行是相同的。提供的每一個資料行都必須是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: At least two provided rows are identical. Each provided row must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 提供的資料列中至少有兩列是相同的。提供的每一個資料列都必須是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added because it is unfrozen and placed before a frozen column.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入資料行，因為它已解除凍結但卻放在已凍結的資料行前面。

trans-unit.source: Row cannot be added because it is unfrozen and placed before a frozen row.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入資料列，因為它已解除凍結但卻放在已凍結的資料列前面。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added because its CellType property is null.
trans-unit.target: 無法加入資料行，因為它的 CellType 屬性是 null。

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be performed while an auto-filled column is being resized.
trans-unit.target: 自動填入的資料行在重新調整大小時，無法執行此作業。

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be performed while the DisplayIndex of a column is being adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 調整資料行的 DisplayIndex 時，無法執行此作業。

trans-unit.source: Columns AutoSize mode cannot be set to Fill because at least one visible column would inherit this AutoSize mode and is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 無法將資料行自動調整模式設定為 Fill，因為至少有一個可見資料行會繼承此自動調整模式，但是它卻已經凍結。

trans-unit.source: Columns AutoSize mode cannot be based exclusively on the headers because the column headers are invisible and at least one visible column would inherit this AutoSize mode.
trans-unit.target: 資料行自動調整模式不能以獨佔方式將行首做為依據，因為資料行行首不可見，而且至少有一個可見資料行會繼承此自動調整模式。

trans-unit.source: Column AutoSize mode cannot be based exclusively on the header because the column headers are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 資料行自動調整模式不能以獨佔方式將行首做為依據，因為資料行行首不可見。

trans-unit.source: Row AutoSize mode cannot be based on the row headers alone while they are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 當資料列行首不可見時，資料列自動調整模式不能只以資料列行首做為依據。

trans-unit.source: Rows AutoSize mode cannot be based on the row headers alone while they are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 當資料列行首不可見時，資料列自動調整模式不能只以資料列行首做為依據。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be made visible because its AutoSize mode includes its header and the column headers are invisible.
trans-unit.target: 無法顯示資料行，因為它的自動調整模式包含行首，但資料行行首不可見。

trans-unit.source: Frozen column cannot be moved after an unfrozen column.
trans-unit.target: 無法將已凍結的資料行移到未凍結的資料行後面。

trans-unit.source: Unfrozen column cannot be moved before a frozen column.
trans-unit.target: 無法將未凍結的資料行移到已凍結的資料行前面。

trans-unit.source: ColumnCount property cannot be set on a data-bound DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 無法在資料繫結 DataGridView 控制項上設定 ColumnCount 屬性。

trans-unit.source: RowCount property cannot be set on a data-bound DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 無法在資料繫結 DataGridView 控制項上設定 RowCount 屬性。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView control must be bound to an IBindingList object to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 必須將 DataGridView 控制項繫結至要排序的 IBindingList 物件。

trans-unit.source: Exception property is not set to a valid exception. ThrowException cannot be set to true.
trans-unit.target: Exception 屬性並未設定為有效的例外狀況。無法將 ThrowException 設定為 true。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView control is data-bound. The control cannot use the comparer to perform the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控制項已資料繫結。控制項無法使用比較子執行排序作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode starts for the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 啟動所選取儲存格的編輯模式時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the border style of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的框線樣式變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The cell border style for the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 的儲存格框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Operation did not succeed because the program cannot commit or quit a cell value change.
trans-unit.target: 作業失敗，因為程式無法認可或結束儲存格值的變更。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下儲存格的任何部分時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下儲存格內的內容時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user double-clicks a cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按兩下儲存格的內容時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip property changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip 屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's context menu strip is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要儲存格的內容功能表區域時發生。

trans-unit.source: Provided cell does not belong to this DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的儲存格不屬於此 DataGridView 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Operation can only be performed on cells that belong to a DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 作業只能在屬於 DataGridView 控制項的儲存格上執行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks anywhere in a cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按兩下儲存格中的任何位置時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 目前所選取儲存格的編輯模式停止時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell receives input focus, becoming the current cell in the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格收到輸入焦點，成為 DataGridView 中的目前儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewCell.ErrorText property of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之 DataGridViewCell.ErrorText 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要儲存格的錯誤文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 需設定要顯示之儲存格內容的格式時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格失去輸入焦點且不再是目前儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever a mouse clicks anywhere on a cell.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠按一下儲存格的任何位置時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell within the DataGridView is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下 DataGridView 內的儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is within the boundaries of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用者在滑鼠指標位於儲存格界限內且按著滑鼠按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標進入儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標離開儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves over the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標移到 DataGridView 控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while over a cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用者在儲存格上方放開滑鼠按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: Cell is not in a DataGridView. The cell cannot retrieve the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格不在 DataGridView 中。儲存格無法擷取繼承的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 需要繪製儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user leaves edit mode, regardless of whether the value of the current cell has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用者離開編輯模式時發生 (無論目前儲存格的值是否已修改)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格狀態變更時發生，例如儲存格失去或獲得焦點時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewCell.Style property of a DataGridViewCell changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell 的 DataGridViewCell.Style 屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格樣式的其中一個值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText property value changes for a cell in the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 中儲存格的 DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText 屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed by the ToolTip associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: 與此儲存格相關的工具提示所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要儲存格的工具提示文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格完成驗證之後發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is validating.
trans-unit.target: 正在驗證儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of the DataGridView control is true and the DataGridView requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控制項的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 屬性為 true，且 DataGridView 的儲存格需要值以便進行格式設定和顯示儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of the DataGridView control is true, and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控制項的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 屬性為 true，而儲存格的值已變更且基礎資料來源中需要儲存區時發生。

trans-unit.source: The underlying value corresponding to a cell value of false, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: 對應 false 儲存格值的基礎值，會顯示為未核取的方塊。

trans-unit.source: The flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊儲存格的平面樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: The underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or null cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 對應不定儲存格值或 null 儲存格值的基礎值，會顯示為已停用的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 表示裝載核取方塊儲存格是否將允許三種核取狀態而非兩種。

trans-unit.source: The underlying value corresponding to a cell value of true, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: 對應 true 儲存格值的基礎值，會顯示為已核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the Clipboard and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者是否可將儲存格文字值複製到剪貼簿，以及是否包含資料列和資料行行首文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 資料行加入至控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Provided column already belongs to the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的資料行已經屬於 DataGridView 控制項。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView column bound to a read-only field must have ReadOnly set to True.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至唯讀欄位的 DataGridView 資料行必須將 ReadOnly 設定為 True。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip 屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu for the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName 屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source property or database column to which the DataGridViewColumn is bound.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewColumn 繫結的資料來源屬性或資料庫資料行的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle 屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value the DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按兩下兩個資料行之間的分割線時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth 變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The width of the column divider in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 資料行分割線的寬度，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Column provided does not belong to this DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的儲存格不屬於此 DataGridView 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a column will move when a user scrolls the DataGridView control horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料行是否會在使用者水平捲動 DataGridView 控制項時移動。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a column header cell change.
trans-unit.target: 資料行行首儲存格的內容變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下資料行行首時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column header is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下資料行行首時發生。

trans-unit.source: The caption text on the column's header cell.
trans-unit.target: 資料行行首儲存格上的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle 屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 套用至資料行行首的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Column headers cannot be made invisible because at least one column uses its header in its AutoSize mode.
trans-unit.target: 無法隱藏資料行行首，因為至少有一個資料行在其自動調整模式中使用該行首。

trans-unit.source: The default column header style.
trans-unit.target: 預設的資料行行首樣式。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the column headers row.
trans-unit.target: 資料行行首資料列的高度，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode property changes.
trans-unit.target: ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Determines the behavior for adjusting the column headers height.
trans-unit.target: 決定用來調整資料行行首高度的行為。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The minimum width of the column in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的最小寬度，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewColumn.Name property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.Name 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound DataGridView control can only be sorted on data-bound columns.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結 DataGridView 控制項只能在資料繫結資料行上進行排序。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user can edit the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者是否可編輯資料行的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is removed from the control.
trans-unit.target: 從控制項移除資料行時發生。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the column is resizable.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否可調整資料行的大小。

trans-unit.source: The sort mode for the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的排序模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column changes state, such as gaining or losing focus.
trans-unit.target: 資料行變更狀態 (例如獲得或失去焦點) 時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridViewColumn.ToolTipText property value changes for a column in the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 中資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.ToolTipText 屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The text used for ToolTips.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示使用的文字。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the column is visible.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否顯示資料行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewColumn.Width property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的 DataGridViewColumn.Width 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current width of the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行目前的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料行中的儲存格是否會比對輸入的字元與其中一個可能的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: The data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 填入下拉式方塊之選取範圍的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 字串，可指定屬性或資料行以從中擷取要在下拉式方塊中顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: Determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.
trans-unit.target: 決定下拉式方塊不能編輯時的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the display style only applies to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 表示顯示樣式是否只適用於目前的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The width of the drop-down lists of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下拉式方塊的下拉式清單寬度。

trans-unit.source: The flat style appearance of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: 資料行儲存格的平面樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: The collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: 用來做為下拉式方塊中選取範圍的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行儲存格的下拉式清單可包含的最大項目數。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否排序下拉式方塊中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: 字串，可指定屬性或資料行以從中取得下拉式清單之選取範圍的對應值。

trans-unit.source: Operation cannot be completed because the current cell could not be committed.
trans-unit.target: 無法完成作業，因為無法認可目前的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Row associated with the currency manager's position cannot be made invisible.
trans-unit.target: 無法隱藏與 Currency 管理員位置關聯的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Current cell cannot be set to an invisible cell.
trans-unit.target: 無法將目前的儲存格設定為不可見的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when DataGridView.CurrentCell changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView.CurrentCell 變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.
trans-unit.target: 當儲存格狀態變更是與儲存格內容變更有關時發生。

trans-unit.source: Value DataGridViewCellBorderStyle. Custom cannot be used to set the {0} property.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用數值 DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom 設定 {0} 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Event raised whenever the data source list changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源清單變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source does not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 外部資料剖析或驗證作業擲回例外狀況，或嘗試認可資料來源的資料失敗時發生。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle to be applied to the DataGridView if no other style is set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定其他樣式時，要套用至 DataGridView 的 DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用者在資料列中輸入新記錄以便填入預設值時發生。

trans-unit.source: Generating Clipboard content is not supported when the ClipboardCopyMode property is Disable.
trans-unit.target: 當 ClipboardCopyMode 屬性為 Disable 時，不支援產生剪貼簿內容的功能。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridView.EditMode property changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView.EditMode 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the mode that determines how cell editing is started.
trans-unit.target: 識別模式，以決定如何開始編輯儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.
trans-unit.target: 顯示編輯儲存格的控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Value '{0}' cannot be set to an empty value.
trans-unit.target: 無法將值 '{0}' 設為空值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether row and column headers use the visual styles of the user's current theme if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: 表示啟用應用程式的視覺化樣式時，資料列和資料行行首是否使用使用者目前主題的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView Default Error Dialog
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 預設錯誤對話方塊

trans-unit.source:
Exception occurred in the DataGridView.
To replace this default dialog box, handle the DataError event.
trans-unit.target:
在 DataGridView 中發生例外狀況。
若要取代此預設對話方塊，請處理 DataError 事件。

trans-unit.source: First displayed cell cannot be set to a header or shared cell.
trans-unit.target: 無法將第一個顯示的儲存格設定為行首或共用儲存格。

trans-unit.source: First displayed cell cannot be set to an invisible cell.
trans-unit.target: 無法將第一個顯示的儲存格設定為不可見的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: FirstDisplayedScrollingColumnIndex property cannot be set to a frozen column.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 FirstDisplayedScrollingColumnIndex 屬性設定為凍結的資料行。

trans-unit.source: FirstDisplayedScrollingColumnIndex property cannot be set to an invisible column.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 FirstDisplayedScrollingColumnIndex 屬性設定為不可見的資料行。

trans-unit.source: FirstDisplayedScrollingRowIndex property cannot be set to a frozen row.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 FirstDisplayedScrollingRowIndex 屬性設定為凍結的資料列。

trans-unit.source: FirstDisplayedScrollingRowIndex property cannot be set to an invisible row.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 FirstDisplayedScrollingRowIndex 屬性設定為不可見的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Operation cannot be performed in this event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式中無法執行作業。

trans-unit.source: The frozen columns do not leave any room for a scrolling column to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 凍結的欄以外，沒有可以顯示可捲動欄的空間。

trans-unit.source: The frozen rows do not leave any room for a scrolling row to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 凍結的列以外，沒有可以顯示可捲動列的空間。

trans-unit.source: Property {0} of a DataGridViewHeaderCell cell cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定 DataGridViewHeaderCell 儲存格的屬性 {0}。

trans-unit.source: DataGridView control cannot be sorted if it is bound to an IBindingList that does not support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結至不支援排序的 IBindingList，則 DataGridView 控制項無法排序。

trans-unit.source: Parameter {0} is not a valid combination of DataGridViewElementState flags.
trans-unit.target: 參數 {0} 不是 DataGridViewElementState 旗標的有效組合。

trans-unit.source: Parameter {0} is not a valid combination of DataGridViewPaintParts flags.
trans-unit.target: 參數 {0} 不是 DataGridViewPaintParts 旗標的有效組合。

trans-unit.source: EditType property of the current cell does not point to a class that derives from System.Windows.Forms.Control and implements the interface IDataGridViewEditingControl.
trans-unit.target: 目前儲存格的 EditType 屬性並未指向衍生自 System.Windows.Forms.Control 且實作 IDataGridViewEditingControl 介面的類別。

trans-unit.source: Operation is not valid when the DataGridView control is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 當 DataGridView 控制項處於虛擬模式時，作業無效。

trans-unit.source: Operation cannot be performed on a cell of a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 無法在共用資料列的儲存格上執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Operation cannot be performed on a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 無法在共用資料列上執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Getting the {0} property of a cell in a shared row is not a valid operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得共用資料列中儲存格的 {0} 屬性不是有效的作業。

trans-unit.source: Getting the {0} property of a shared row is not a valid operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得共用資料列的 {0} 屬性不是有效的作業。

trans-unit.source: Setting the {0} property of a shared row is not a valid operation.
trans-unit.target: 設定共用資料列的 {0} 屬性不是有效的作業。

trans-unit.source: The color used to display an active link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示資料行中儲存格內之作用中連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the behavior of links within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料行中儲存格內之連結行為的值。

trans-unit.source: The color used to display an unselected link within cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示資料行中儲存格內的未選取連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The link text displayed in all of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: 在所有資料行的儲存格中顯示的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the link changes color if it has been visited.
trans-unit.target: 表示連結經過瀏覽後是否變更色彩。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: 表示 DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text 屬性值是否顯示為連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The color used to display a link that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示之前已瀏覽過之連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the DataGridView at a time.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否允許使用者一次選取多個 DataGridView 的儲存格、資料列或資料行。

trans-unit.source: Parameter {0} is not valid for this operation. This parameter value must specify a mode which AutoSizes.
trans-unit.target: 參數 {0} 對此項作業無效。此參數值必須指定自動調整模式。

trans-unit.source: Parameter {0} is not valid for this operation. It cannot be NotSet, None or Fill but needs to indicate a sizing criteria.
trans-unit.target: 參數 {0} 對此項作業無效。不可為 NotSet、None 或 Fill，必須指定大小準則。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of the DataGridView is true and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the DataGridView.
trans-unit.target: DataGridView 的 DataGridView.VirtualMode 屬性為 true，且使用者巡覽至 DataGridView 底部的新資料列時發生。

trans-unit.source: Operation cannot be performed because there is no current cell. The CurrentCell property needs to be set first.
trans-unit.target: 由於沒有目前的儲存格，因此無法執行作業。您必須先設定 CurrentCell 屬性。

trans-unit.source: No room is available to display columns.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可以顯示欄的空間。

trans-unit.source: No room is available to display rows.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可以顯示列的空間。

trans-unit.source: Operation is not supported when VirtualMode is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 當 VirtualMode 設定為 true 時，不支援作業。

trans-unit.source: PreviousModes array has the wrong length. Its length must be equal to the number of columns in the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: PreviousModes 陣列的長度錯誤。它的長度必須等於 DataGridView 控制項中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: Property {0} must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 {0} 必須設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: Operation not supported. Collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 不支援此作業，集合是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user can edit the cells of the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者是否可編輯 DataGridView 控制項的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Row provided already belongs to a DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的資料列已經屬於 DataGridView 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip changes.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip 變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu for the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the context menu strip is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要內容功能表區域時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的 DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle 屬性的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The default cell style to be applied to the DataGridViewRow if no other style is set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定其他樣式時，要套用至 DataGridViewRow 的預設儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the DataGridView.VirtualMode property of the DataGridView control is true and the DataGridView needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.

trans-unit.source: The default style applied to the row header cells.

trans-unit.target: 決定用來調整資料列行首寬度的行為。

trans-unit.target: DataGridView 控制項的 SelectionMode 無法設為 {0}，因為它包含 SortMode 設為 DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic 的資料行。

trans-unit.target: DataGridView 比較兩個儲存格值以執行排序作業時發生。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.

trans-unit.target: 傳回方格中可見資料行的計數。

trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for navigation and manipulation of data bound to controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面，以巡覽及操作繫結至表單上控制項的資料。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a data source for a form and provides navigation, filtering, sorting, and updating capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 封裝表單的資料來源，並提供巡覽、篩選、排序和更新等功能。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when the user clicks it.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select or clear the associated option.
trans-unit.target: 讓使用者可以選取或清除相關選項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a list of items with a check box on the left side of each item.
trans-unit.target: 顯示項目清單，並於每一個項目左邊顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Displays available colors along with controls that enable the user to define custom colors.
trans-unit.target: 顯示可用的色彩，以及可讓使用者定義自訂色彩的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays an editable text box with a drop-down list of permitted values.
trans-unit.target: 顯示可編輯的文字方塊，以及允許值的下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: Displays a shortcut menu when the user right-clicks the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者在相關的控制項上按一下滑鼠右鍵時顯示捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: Displays rows and columns of data in a grid you can customize.
trans-unit.target: 在您可以自訂的方格中顯示資料列和資料行。

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in a specified format.
trans-unit.target: 讓使用者可以選取日期和時間，並以指定的格式顯示該日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Displays a single string value that the user selected from a list of items by clicking up and down buttons in the control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下控制項中的上下按鈕，顯示使用者從項目清單中選取的單一字串值。

trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface to indicate to the user that a control on a form has an error associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面，以便向使用者指出，表單上的控制項發生與其相關的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Handles the layout of its components and arranges them in a flow layout automatically.
trans-unit.target: 處理其元件的配置，並自動以流程配置排列元件。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that prompts the user to select a folder.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，以提示使用者選取資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that prompts the user to choose a font from those installed on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，以提示使用者從安裝在本機電腦的字型中選擇。

trans-unit.source: Displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項群組周圍顯示框架以及選擇性的標題。

trans-unit.source: Enables its parent component to scroll content horizontally. Unnecessary if the parent has an autoscroll attribute, and that attribute is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 讓其父元件可以水平捲動內容。如果父代具有 autoscroll 屬性且該屬性已經啟用，便不需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項的快顯畫面或線上說明。

trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of images that are typically used by other controls such as ListView, TreeView, or ToolStrip.
trans-unit.target: 管理通常由其他控制項 (例如 ListView、TreeView 或 ToolStrip) 使用的影像集合。

trans-unit.source: Provides run-time information or descriptive text for a control.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項的執行階段資訊或描述文字。

trans-unit.source: Displays a label control that supports hyperlink functionality, formatting, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 顯示支援超連結功能、格式化和追蹤的標籤控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a list from which the user can select items.
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者可從中選取項目的清單。

trans-unit.source: Displays a collection of items in one of five different views.
trans-unit.target: 以五種不同檢視的其中之一顯示項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Uses a mask to distinguish between proper and improper user input.
trans-unit.target: 使用遮罩區別適當及不適當的使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: Displays application commands and options grouped by functionality.
trans-unit.target: 顯示依功能分組的應用程式命令和選項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a monthly calendar from which the user can select a date.
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者可以用來選取日期的月曆。

trans-unit.source: Displays an icon in the notification area, on the right side of the Windows taskbar, during run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段期間，於 Windows 工作列右邊的告知區域中顯示圖示。

trans-unit.source: Displays a single numeric value that the user can increment and decrement by clicking up and down buttons on the control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者可以遞增及遞減的單一數值 (透過按一下控制項中的上下按鈕)。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that prompts the user to open a file.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，以提示使用者開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that enables the user to change page-related print settings, including margins and paper orientation.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，讓使用者可以變更頁面的相關列印設定，包括邊界和紙張方向。

trans-unit.source: Enables you to group collections of controls.
trans-unit.target: 讓您可以群組控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: Displays an image.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that enables the user to select a printer and choose other print options such as the number of copies and page orientation.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，讓使用者可以選取印表機以及選擇其他列印選項，例如列印份數和頁面方向。

trans-unit.source: Represents only the portion of a print preview that shows the document being previewed. Does not contain any dialog boxes or buttons.
trans-unit.target: 只呈現列印預覽畫面中顯示預覽文件的部分。不包含任何對話方塊或按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that shows the user a preview of what the associated document will look like when printed.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，供使用者檢視相關文件列印出來的外觀預覽。

trans-unit.source: Displays a bar that fills to indicate to the user the progress of an operation.
trans-unit.target: 顯示逐漸填滿的進度列，對使用者指出作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for browsing the properties of an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面，以瀏覽物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other RadioButtons.
trans-unit.target: 搭配其他選項按鈕時，可以讓使用者從一組選項中選取單一選項。

trans-unit.source: Provides advanced text entry and editing features such as character and paragraph formatting.
trans-unit.target: 提供進階的文字輸入和編輯功能，例如字元和段落的格式。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box that prompts the user to select a location for saving a file.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，以提示使用者選取儲存檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Divides a container's display area into two resizable panels to which you can add controls.
trans-unit.target: 將容器的顯示區域分割成兩個可以調整大小項的面板，您可以將控制項加入面板中。

trans-unit.source: Divides a container's display area into two areas which can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 將容器的顯示區域分割成兩個可調整大小的區域。

trans-unit.source: Displays information to the user about the object being viewed, the object's components, or the object's operation.
trans-unit.target: 向使用者顯示正在檢視之物件、物件元件或物件作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Manages and displays to the user a related collection of tabs that can contain controls and components.
trans-unit.target: 管理並向使用者顯示可以包含控制項和元件的相關索引標籤集合。

trans-unit.source: Handles the layout of its components and arranges them in the format of a table automatically.
trans-unit.target: 處理其元件的配置，並自動以資料表的格式排列元件。

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to enter text, and provides multiline editing and password character masking.
trans-unit.target: 讓使用者可以輸入文字，並提供多行編輯與密碼字元遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Component that raises an event at user defined intervals
trans-unit.target: 按照使用者定義間隔引發事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: Provides toolbars and other user interface elements that support many appearance options, and that support overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: 提供工具列和其他使用者介面項目，以支援許多外觀選項，並支援溢位和執行階段項目重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Displays information when the user moves the pointer over an associated control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將指標移至相關控制項時顯示資訊。

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to choose between a range of values by sliding a small bar along another bar.
trans-unit.target: 讓使用者可以沿著另一個滑桿移動小滑桿，以便選擇不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items to the user that optionally contain an image.
trans-unit.target: 向使用者顯示選擇性包含影像的階層式標記項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Enables its parent component to scroll content vertically. Unnecessary if the parent has an autoscroll attribute, and the attribute is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 讓其父元件可以垂直捲動內容。如果父代具有 autoscroll 屬性且該屬性已經啟用，便不需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: Enables the user to browse Web pages inside your form.
trans-unit.target: 讓使用者可以瀏覽表單內部的 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Operation {0} on the component did not succeed, generating the error code 0x{1:X}.
trans-unit.target: 元件的作業 {0} 失敗，產生錯誤碼 0x{1:X}。

trans-unit.source: The allowable values of the DomainUpDown.
trans-unit.target: DomainUpDown 的允許值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected item in the control changes.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項中所選取的項目變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected domain value.
trans-unit.target: 所選取 Domain 值的索引。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected domain value.
trans-unit.target: 目前所選取的 Domain 值。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether items in the domain list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否排序 Domain 清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether values wrap around at either end of the item list.
trans-unit.target: 表示到達項目清單結尾時，是否要循環回到起始處。

trans-unit.source: DragDrop registration did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: DragDrop 登錄失敗。

trans-unit.source: inputLanguage is not recognized by the system.
trans-unit.target: 系統無法辨識此 inputLanguage。

trans-unit.source: Collection has reached its maximum capacity.
trans-unit.target: 集合已經到達它的最大容量。

trans-unit.source: Error creating window handle.
trans-unit.target: 建立視窗控制代碼時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Invoke or BeginInvoke cannot be called on a control until the window handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 視窗控制代碼建立後才能呼叫控制項上的 Invoke 或 BeginInvoke。

trans-unit.source: Component did not succeed to show the property page.
trans-unit.target: 元件無法顯示屬性頁。

trans-unit.source: The rate in milliseconds at which the error icon blinks.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤圖示閃爍的速率 (使用毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the error icon blinks when an error is set.
trans-unit.target: 控制錯誤圖示是否於發現錯誤時閃爍。

trans-unit.source: The parent control, usually the form, that contains the data-bound controls on which the ErrorProvider can display error icons.
trans-unit.target: 父控制項 (通常為表單)，包含可讓 ErrorProvider 在其上顯示錯誤圖示的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the sub-list of data from the DataSource to bind errors against.
trans-unit.target: 表示要繫結錯誤的 DataSource 資料子清單。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the source of data to bind errors against.
trans-unit.target: 表示要繫結錯誤的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Error provider
trans-unit.target: 錯誤提供者

trans-unit.source: The error description for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的錯誤描述。

trans-unit.source: The location of the error icon relative to the control.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤圖示相對於控制項的位置。

trans-unit.source: The icon used to indicate an error.
trans-unit.target: 用來表示錯誤的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels to leave between the error icon and the control.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤圖示與控制項間要空出的像素數目。

trans-unit.source: Error occurred while trying to set the window region for the MDI client.
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試設定 MDI 用戶端的視窗區域時，發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Component did not succeed to show the editor.
trans-unit.target: 元件無法顯示編輯器。

trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source:
Unhandled exception has occurred in a component in your application. If you click Continue, the application will ignore this error and attempt to continue.
{0}.
trans-unit.target:
您的應用程式中的元件發生未處理的例外狀況。如果您按一下 [繼續]，應用程式會忽略此錯誤並嘗試繼續。
{0}。

trans-unit.target: 錯誤文字

trans-unit.source:
Unhandled exception has occurred in your application. If you click Continue, the application will ignore this error and attempt to continue. If you click Quit, the application will close immediately.
{0}.
trans-unit.target:
您的應用程式發生未處理的例外狀況。如果您按一下 [繼續]，應用程式會忽略錯誤並嘗試繼續。如果您按一下 [結束]，則會立即關閉應用程式。
{0}

trans-unit.target: 例外狀況文字

trans-unit.source: Application does not support Windows Forms just-in-time (JIT) debugging. Contact the application author for more information.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式不支援 Windows Form JIT (Just-In-Time) 偵錯功能。如需詳細資訊，請洽詢該應用程式 的作者。

trans-unit.source: Application does not support just-in-time (JIT) debugging. See the end of this message for details.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式不支援 Just-In-Time (JIT) 偵錯功能。 如需詳細資料，請參閱本訊息結尾處。

trans-unit.source: See the end of this message for details on invoking just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如需叫用 Just-In-Time (JIT) 偵錯的詳細資料， 請參閱本訊息結尾處 (而非這個對話方塊) 的資訊。

trans-unit.source: JIT Debugging
trans-unit.target: JIT 偵錯

trans-unit.source:
Application attempted to perform an operation not allowed by the security policy. To grant this application the required permission, contact your system administrator, or use the Microsoft .NET Configuration tool.
If you click Continue, the application will ignore this error and attempt to continue.
{1}.
trans-unit.target:
應用程式嘗試執行安全性原則不允許的作業。若要將必要權限授與此應用程式，請連絡您的系統管理員，或使用 Microsoft .NET 組態工具。
如果您按一下 [繼續]，應用程式將會略過此錯誤，然後嘗試繼續執行。
{1}。

trans-unit.source:
Application attempted to perform an operation not allowed by the security policy. To grant this application the required permission, contact your system administrator, or use the Microsoft .NET Configuration tool.
If you click Continue, the application will ignore this error and attempt to continue. If you click Quit, the application will close immediately.
{1}.
trans-unit.target:
應用程式嘗試執行安全性原則不允許的作業。若要將必要權限授與此應用程式，請連絡您的系統管理員，或使用 Microsoft .NET 組態工具。
如果您按一下 [繼續]，應用程式將會略過此錯誤，然後嘗試繼續執行。如果您按一下 [結束]，應用程式將立即關閉。

trans-unit.source: ComponentEditorControl: {0} cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立 ComponentEditorControl: {0}。

trans-unit.source: Exception occurred while trying to create an instance of {0}. The exception was "{1}".
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試建立 {0} 的執行個體時發生例外狀況。例外狀況為 "{1}"。

trans-unit.source: External exception
trans-unit.target: 外部例外狀況

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 擷取對話方塊中所有已選取檔案的檔名。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether extensions are automatically added to file names.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否自動在檔名之後加上副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the specified file exists before returning from the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 從對話方塊傳回前，檢查指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the specified path exists before returning from the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 從對話方塊傳回前，檢查指定的路徑是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The default file name extension. If the user types a file name, this extension is added at the end of the file name if one is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 預設的副檔名。如果使用者輸入檔名時沒有指定副檔名，便將此加在檔名之後。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether shortcuts are dereferenced before returning from the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 控制從對話方塊傳回前，是否解除參考捷徑。

trans-unit.source: The file first shown in the dialog box, or the last one selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 第一次顯示於對話方塊中的檔案，或使用者所選取的最後一個檔案。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the Open or Save button in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下對話方塊中的 [開啟] 或 [儲存] 按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: The file filters to display in the dialog box, for example, "C# files|*.cs|All files|*.*".
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中顯示的檔案篩選條件，例如，"C# 檔案|*.cs|所有檔案|*.*"。

trans-unit.source: The index of the file filter selected in the dialog box. The first item has an index of 1.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中檔案篩選條件選取的索引。第一個項目的索引為 1。

trans-unit.source: The initial directory for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊的初始目錄。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the dialog box restores the current directory before closing.
trans-unit.target: 控制對話方塊於關閉前是否還原目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Enables the Help button.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether multi-dotted extensions are supported.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否支援多點的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The string to display in the title bar of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在對話方塊標題列的字串。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the dialog box ensures that file names do not contain invalid characters or sequences.
trans-unit.target: 控制對話方塊是否要確認檔名並未包含無效的字元或逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: Too many files selected. Select fewer files and try again.
trans-unit.target: 選取太多檔案。請少選一點檔案再試一次。

trans-unit.source: File {0} does not exist. Do you want to create it?
trans-unit.target: 檔案 {0} 不存在。 要建立嗎?

trans-unit.source: File {0} does not exist. Verify that the correct file name was given.
trans-unit.target: 檔案 {0} 不存在。 請確定已經提供正確的檔名。

trans-unit.source: File {0} is not a valid file name.
trans-unit.target: 檔案 {0} 是無效的檔名。

trans-unit.source: Filter string you provided is not valid. The filter string must contain a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. The strings for different filtering options must also be separated by the vertical bar. Example: "Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*"
trans-unit.target: 提供的篩選條件字串無效。篩選條件字串必須含有篩選條件的描述，字串最後需再加上分隔號 (|) 以及篩選條件模式。不同篩選條件選項的字串也必須使用分隔號予以區隔。例如: "文字檔 (*.txt)|*.txt|所有檔案 (*.*)|*.*"

trans-unit.source: Filter index not valid.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件索引無效。

trans-unit.source: File {0} already exists. Do you want to replace it?
trans-unit.target: 檔案 {0} 已經存在。 您要取代它嗎?

trans-unit.source: Attempt to subclass a list box did not succeed. Not enough memory is available.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試子類別化清單方塊失敗。記憶體不足。

trans-unit.source: Can only set filter on an IBindingListView where SupportsFiltering is true.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 SupportsFiltering 為 true 的情況下，才可以對 IBindingListView 設定篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Key specified was either empty or null.
trans-unit.target: 指定的機碼是空的或為 null。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction in which controls are laid out.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項的配置方向。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether contents are wrapped or clipped at the control boundary.
trans-unit.target: 表示內容應在控制項界限處換行或裁剪。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the character set of the font can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否可以變更字型的字元集。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether GDI font simulations are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否允許模擬 GDI 字型。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether vector fonts can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否可以選取向量字型。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether vertical fonts can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否可以選取垂直字型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the Apply button.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 [套用] 按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: The color selected in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中選取的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether only fixed pitch fonts can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否僅能選取固定字幅的字型。

trans-unit.source: The font selected in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中所選取的字型。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to report an error if the selected font does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 控制如果選取的字型不存在時，是否報告錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The maximum point size that can be Selected (or zero to disable).
trans-unit.target: 可以選取的最大點數大小 (或 0 以停用)。

trans-unit.source: The minimum point size that can be Selected (or zero to disable).
trans-unit.target: 可以選取的最小點數大小 (或 0 以停用)。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to exclude OEM and Symbol character sets.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否排除 OEM 與符號字元集。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show the Apply button.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示 [套用] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show a color choice.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示色彩選擇。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show the underline, strikeout, and font color selections.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示底線、刪除線、及字型色彩選取區。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show the Help button.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The string that is displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box. This string can be used to specify instructions to the user.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在對話方塊中樹狀檢視控制項上方的字串。這個字串可以用來指定對使用者的指示。

trans-unit.source: Unable to retrieve the root folder.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取根資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The location of the root folder from which to start browsing. Only the specified folder and any subfolders that are beneath it will appear in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 要從這裡開始瀏覽的根資料夾位置。只有在它之下的指定資料夾及任何子資料夾才會出現在對話方塊中。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder first selected in the dialog or the last one selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中第一個選取的資料夾或使用者選取的最後一個資料夾的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Include the New Folder button in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在對話方塊中包括 [新增資料夾] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether to use the value of the Description property as the dialog title for Vista style dialogs. This property has no effect on old style dialogs.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會指出是否要將 Description 屬性的值用作 Vista 樣式對話方塊的對話方塊標題。此屬性不會對舊樣式的對話方塊產生影響。

trans-unit.source: The accept button of the form. If this is set, the button is 'clicked' whenever the user presses the 'ENTER' key.
trans-unit.target: 表單的接受按鈕。如果加以設定，當使用者按下 ENTER 鍵時就代表按鈕被「按下」。

trans-unit.source: The currently active MDI child form.
trans-unit.target: 目前作用中的 MDI 子表單。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the form will automatically scale with the screen font.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 true，表單會自動隨螢幕字型縮放。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether scroll bars automatically appear when the control contents are larger than its visible area.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項內容大於可見區域時，捲軸是否自動出現。

trans-unit.source: The margin around controls during auto scroll.
trans-unit.target: 有設定使用自動捲軸時，控制項周圍的邊界大小。

trans-unit.source: The minimum logical size for the auto scroll region.
trans-unit.target: 自動捲動區域的最小邏輯大小。

trans-unit.source: The current position of the auto-scrolling scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 自動捲動捲軸目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the appearance and behavior of the border and title bar of the form.
trans-unit.target: 表示表單框線和標題列的外觀和行為。

trans-unit.source: The cancel button of the form. If this property is set, the button is 'clicked' whenever the user presses the 'ESC' key.
trans-unit.target: 表單的取消按鈕。如果設定此屬性，當使用者按下 'ESC' 鍵時就代表「已按下」該按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a form has a Control/System menu box.
trans-unit.target: 決定表單是否有系統控制功能表方塊。

trans-unit.source: The bounds of this form in desktop coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此表單在桌面座標中的界限。

trans-unit.source: The location of this form in desktop coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此表單在桌面座標中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The value this form will return if displayed as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示為對話方塊，此表單會傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the help button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按下說明按鈕時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a form has a Help button on the caption bar.
trans-unit.target: 決定表單在標題列是否有 [說明] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the icon for a form. This icon is displayed in the form's system menu box and when the form is minimized.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the form is a child of a MDI container.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the form is an MDI container.
trans-unit.target: 決定此表單是否為 MDI 容器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether keyboard events for controls on the form are registered with the form.
trans-unit.target: 決定表單上控制項的鍵盤事件是否與表單一起登錄。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the MDI children of this form.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the MDI parent of this form.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a form has a maximize box in the upper-right corner of its caption bar.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size the form can be resized to.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the primary MenuStrip for the Form. This property is used for keyboard activation and automatic merging in MDI.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a form has a minimize box in the upper-right corner of its caption bar.

trans-unit.source: The minimum size the form can be resized to.

trans-unit.source: Indicates if this form is currently being displayed as a modal dialog box.

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the form is activated.
trans-unit.target: 當啟動表單時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user closes the form, after the form has been closed.

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user closes the form, before the form has been closed.

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the form is deactivated.

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user closes the form, after the form has been closed and specifies the close reason.

trans-unit.target: 當使用者關閉表單，並於表單關閉前指定關閉原因時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the language used for input for this form changes.

trans-unit.target: 控制繪製於 ListBox 周圍的框線類型。

trans-unit.source: ListBox.IntegerCollection is sorted, and items cannot be inserted into it.
trans-unit.target: ListBox.IntegerCollection 已經排序，無法插入項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how wide each column should be in a multicolumn ListBox.
trans-unit.target: 表示多欄清單方塊 (ListBox) 中每一欄的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The collection of pixel offsets each corresponding TAB character will be placed from the near edge of the client area.
trans-unit.target: 從工作區近端邊緣放置每一個對應 TAB 字元時的像素偏移集合。

trans-unit.source: Controls list box painting. Either the system [NORMAL] or the user [OWNERDRAW] paints each item.
trans-unit.target: 控制清單方塊的繪製。系統 [NORMAL] 或使用者 [OWNERDRAW] 繪製每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, by which a list box can be scrolled horizontally. Only valid if HorizontalScrollBars is true.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊可以水平捲動的寬度，以像素為單位。只有在 HorizontalScrollBars 為 true 時才有效。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the ListBox will display a horizontal scroll bar for items beyond the right edge of the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: 表示清單方塊 ListBox 的右方邊界，是否要有水平捲軸以顯示 ListBox 的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the list can contain only complete items.
trans-unit.target: 表示清單是否可以只包含完整的項目。

trans-unit.source: Cannot call this method when SelectionMode is SelectionMode.NONE.
trans-unit.target: 當 SelectionMode 為 SelectionMode.NONE 時不可以呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of items in a fixed-height owner-draw list box.
trans-unit.target: 固定高度主控描繪清單方塊中項目的高度，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: List box contains too many items.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊中的項目太多。

trans-unit.source: The items in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if values should be displayed in columns horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否在欄中水平顯示值。

trans-unit.source: The preferred height of this control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項的慣用高度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the list box should always have a scroll bar present, regardless of how many items are in it.
trans-unit.target: 表示不論有多少項目，清單方塊是否應該永遠顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection is read only.
trans-unit.target: ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first selection in the list box, or -1 if there is no selection.
trans-unit.target: 擷取清單方塊中第一個選取項目的索引，如果沒有選取項目則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: A collection of indexes for the currently selected items in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊中目前選取項目的索引集合。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected item in the list box, or null.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊中目前選取的項目或 null。

trans-unit.source: A collection of currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection is read only.
trans-unit.target: ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the list box is to be single-select, multi-select, or not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 表示清單方塊為單一選取、多重選取或無法選取。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the list is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否排序清單。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first visible item in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊中第一個可見項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if TAB characters should be expanded into full spacing.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否將 TAB 字元轉換為空白字元。

trans-unit.source: ListBox cannot have variable height and be multicolumn. Either make the ListBox owner-draw fixed height, or make the ListBox single column.
trans-unit.target: ListBox 不能同時有可變高度和多欄。不是讓 ListBox 成為主控描繪固定高度，就是讓 ListBox 成為單欄。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the list that this control will use to get its items.
trans-unit.target: 表示此控制項將會用來取得其項目的清單。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the property to display for the items in this control.
trans-unit.target: 表示為此控制項中項目所顯示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Cannot set the SelectedValue in a ListControl with an empty ValueMember.
trans-unit.target: 不可以用空的 ValueMember 設定 ListControl 中的 SelectedValue。

trans-unit.source: Event raised to allow you to convert the value to a value suitable for display.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓您將值轉換成適合顯示的值所引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the FormatInfo property changed.
trans-unit.target: FormatInfo 屬性值變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the FormatString property is changed.
trans-unit.target: FormatString 屬性值變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 表示值之顯示方式的格式規範字元。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the FormattingEnabled property is changed.
trans-unit.target: FormattingEnabled 屬性值變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is true, the value of FormatString is used to convert the value of DisplayMember into a value that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性為 true，便使用 FormatString 的值將 DisplayMember 的值轉換成可以顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the DataSource property is changed on ListControl.
trans-unit.target: DataSource 屬性值在 ListControl 上變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the DisplayMember property is changed on ListControl.
trans-unit.target: DisplayMember 屬性值在 ListControl 上變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the SelectedValue property is changed on ListControl.
trans-unit.target: SelectedValue 屬性值在 ListControl 上變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the value of the ValueMember property is changed on ListControl.
trans-unit.target: ValueMember 屬性值在 ListControl 上變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the actual value of the currently selected item. Setting it will cause the item whose actual value is equal to become selected.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前所選取項目的實際值。設定它會選取實際值相同的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the property to use as the actual value for the items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示當做控制項中項目實際值的屬性來使用。

trans-unit.source: Cannot bind to the new display member.
trans-unit.target: 無法繫結至新的顯示成員。

trans-unit.target: 無法繫結至新的值成員。

trans-unit.source: Enumerator's current position is out of the bounds of the list.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式目前的位置已超出清單的範圍。

trans-unit.source: List that this enumerator is bound to has been modified. An enumerator can only be used if the list does not change.
trans-unit.target: 繫結這個列舉程式的清單已遭修改。只有在清單未變更的情況下才可以使用列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: Position is either less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 位置小於 0 或大於資料來源中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Cannot operate with an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用空的清單作業。

trans-unit.source: Index {0} does not have a value.
trans-unit.target: 索引 {0} 沒有值。

trans-unit.source: Data sources of type {0} are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援類型 {0} 的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of action required by the user to activate an item, and the feedback given.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者啟動項目所需的動作類型與所給的回應。

trans-unit.source: When HotTracking is on, activation must be ItemActivation.OneClick.
trans-unit.target: HotTracking 開啟時，啟用過程必須是 ItemActivation.OneClick。

trans-unit.source: Column cannot be added to ListView.
trans-unit.target: 無法將資料行加入 ListView。

trans-unit.source: Item cannot be added to ListView.
trans-unit.target: 無法將項目加入 ListView。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the text of an item has been edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者已經編輯項目的文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how items are aligned within the ListView.
trans-unit.target: 表示項目如何在 ListView 內對齊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the user can reorder columns in Details view.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者是否可以在詳細資料檢視中重新排列資料行。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether items are kept arranged automatically when in LargeIcon or SmallIcon view.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否要自動排列 LargeIcon 或 SmallIcon 檢視中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the background image will be tiled to fill the entire background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否並排顯示背景影像，以填滿控制項的整個背景。

trans-unit.source: Parameter must be of type ListViewSubItem.
trans-unit.target: 參數必須屬於 ListViewSubItem 類型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the text of an item is about to be edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者即將編輯項目的文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: BeginEdit did not succeed because the LabelEdit property is false.
trans-unit.target: 因為 LabelEdit 屬性為 false，所以 BeginEdit 失敗。

trans-unit.source: Notifies users of virtual ListView controls that they should prepare their cache.
trans-unit.target: 通知虛擬 ListView 控制項的使用者應該準備快取區。

trans-unit.source: Cannot access the checked items collection when the ListView is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 當 ListView 處於虛擬模式時，無法存取已核取的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Cannot access the selected items collection when the ListView is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 當 ListView 處於虛擬模式時，無法存取已選取的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: When the ListView is in virtual mode, you cannot add items to the ListView items collection. Use the VirtualListSize property instead to change the size of the ListView items collection.
trans-unit.target: 當 ListView 處於虛擬模式時，您便無法將項目加入 ListView 項目集合中。請改用 VirtualListSize 屬性來變更 ListView 項目集合的大小。

trans-unit.source: When the ListView is in virtual mode, you cannot enumerate through the ListView items collection using an enumerator or call GetEnumerator. Use the ListView items indexer instead and access an item by index value.
trans-unit.target: 當 ListView 處於虛擬模式時，您無法使用列舉程式透過 ListView 項目集合列舉或呼叫 GetEnumerator。請改用 ListView 項目索引子，並使用索引值存取項目。

trans-unit.source: Cannot modify the items collection in a virtual ListView.
trans-unit.target: 無法修改虛擬 ListView 中的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: When the ListView is in virtual mode, you cannot remove items from the ListView items collection. Use the VirtualListSize property instead to change the size of the ListView items collection.
trans-unit.target: 當 ListView 處於虛擬模式時，您便無法從 ListView 項目集合中移除項目。請改用 VirtualListSize 屬性來變更 ListView 項目集合的大小。

trans-unit.source: Tile view is not supported in VirtualMode.
trans-unit.target: VirtualMode 中不支援並排顯示。

trans-unit.target: 在並排顯示時不支援 VirtualMode。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether check boxes are displayed beside items.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否在項目旁顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: CheckBoxes are not supported in Tile view. Choose a different view or set CheckBoxes to false.
trans-unit.target: 並排顯示中不支援 CheckBox。請選擇不同的檢視或將 CheckBox 設為 false。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column header is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下資料行行首時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the ListView column header has been reordered.
trans-unit.target: 重新排列 ListView 資料行行首時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user stops dragging the column header divider. Works only in Details mode.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者停止拖曳資料行行首分割線時發生。只有在詳細資料模式下才有作用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags the column header divider. Works only in Details mode.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者拖曳資料行行首分割線時發生。只有在詳細資料模式下才有作用。

trans-unit.source: The columns shown in Details view.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在詳細資料檢視中的資料行。

trans-unit.target: 當在主控描繪模式下必須繪製資料行行首時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs in owner-draw mode, when an item needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 當在主控描繪模式下必須繪製項目時發生。

trans-unit.target: 只有當 ListView 處於 SMALLICON 或 LARGEICON 檢視時，才能支援 FindNearestItem。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether all SubItems are highlighted along with the item when selected.

trans-unit.target: 使用 LargeIcon、SmallIcon 或並排顯示時無法取得第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Displays grid lines around items and SubItems. Only shown when in Details view.
trans-unit.target: 顯示項目與子項目周圍的格線。只有在詳細資料檢視中才顯示。

trans-unit.source: Parameter must be of type ListViewGroup.
trans-unit.target: 參數的類型必須為 ListViewGroup。

trans-unit.source: Default
trans-unit.target: 預設值

trans-unit.source: ListViewGroup
trans-unit.target: ListViewGroup

trans-unit.target: 此群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The groups in the ListView.
trans-unit.target: ListView 中的群組。

trans-unit.source: The style of the column headers in Details view.
trans-unit.target: 詳細資料檢視中資料行行首的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Removes highlighting from the selected item when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項沒有焦點時，從所選取的項目移除反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: Allows items to appear as hyperlinks when the mouse hovers over them.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠停留在項目上時，可將項目顯示成超連結。

trans-unit.source: When HotTracking is on, HoverSelection must also be enabled.
trans-unit.target: HotTracking 開啟時，必須同時啟用 HoverSelection。

trans-unit.source: Allows items to be selected by hovering over them with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用滑鼠停留在項目上的方式來選取項目。

trans-unit.source: IndentCount property on the ListViewItem class does not accept negative values.
trans-unit.target: ListViewItem 類別上的 IndentCount 屬性不接受負數值。

trans-unit.source: Allows insertion mark attributes to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 允許變更插入標記屬性。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the checked property of a ListView item changes.
trans-unit.target: ListView 項目的核取屬性變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: 當啟動項目時發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者開始拖曳項目時發生。

trans-unit.source: The key in the image-list value that represents the image to display. when the list view item is in the unselected state.

trans-unit.source: Number of indents for a list ListViewItem
trans-unit.target: 清單 ListViewItem 的縮排數目

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over an item.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠停留在項目上時發生。

trans-unit.source: The items in the ListView.
trans-unit.target: ListView 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Allows item labels to be edited in place by the user.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether label text can wrap to a new line.

trans-unit.source: The ImageList control used by the ListView for images in Large Icon View.
trans-unit.target: 使用大型圖示檢視時，ListView 的影像所使用的 ImageList 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Allows multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 允許選取多重項目。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the system or the user paints items/SubItems.
trans-unit.target: 控制系統或使用者是否會繪製項目/子項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the virtual item from the user.
trans-unit.target: 從使用者擷取虛擬項目。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the control will display scroll bars if it contains more items than can fit in the client area.
trans-unit.target: 表示如果控制項包含比工作區所能容納還要多的項目，是否顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the user that a search is taking place on a virtual ListView.
trans-unit.target: 通知使用者即將在虛擬 ListView 上執行搜尋作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the 'SelectedIndex' property for this ListView changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個 ListView 的 'SelectedIndex' 屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: A collection of items that are currently selected in the ListView.
trans-unit.target: ListView 中目前所選取項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Cannot set the TopItem in LargeIcon, SmallIcon, or Tile View.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LargeIcon、SmallIcon 或並排顯示時無法設定 TopItem。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the control will display the items in group form.

trans-unit.source: Sorting is not allowed in a virtual ListView.
trans-unit.target: 不允許在虛擬 ListView 中進行排序。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the manner in which items are to be sorted.

trans-unit.source: The startIndex value cannot be larger than the endIndex value.
trans-unit.target: startIndex 值不能大於 endIndex 值。

trans-unit.source: The ImageList control used by the ListView for custom states.

trans-unit.source: Argument must be of type ListViewSubItem.

trans-unit.source: The size of the tile in Tile view.

trans-unit.target: TileSize 必須為正數。

trans-unit.source: Tile view does not support CheckBoxes. Choose a different view or set CheckBoxes to false.
trans-unit.target: 並排顯示不支援 CheckBox。請選擇不同的檢視或將 CheckBox 設為 false。

trans-unit.source: The first item that is visible to the user.
trans-unit.target: 第一個使用者可見的項目。

trans-unit.source: Selects one of five different views that items can be shown in.
trans-unit.target: 選取可以顯示項目的五種不同檢視其中之一。

trans-unit.source: ListView virtualization requires a valid ListViewItem to be provided by the RetrieveVirtualItem event or in the OnRetrieveVirtualItem method.
trans-unit.target: 必須由 RetrieveVirtualItem 事件或在 OnRetrieveVirtualItem 方法中提供有效的 ListViewItem，才能執行 ListView 的虛擬化作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the state of a virtual item is changed.
trans-unit.target: 當虛擬項目的狀態變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Event raised when the selection state of a range of items has changed. This event in raised only in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 項目範圍的選取狀態變更時引發的事件。只有在虛擬模式下時才會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the count of the item collection when the ListView is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 設定 ListView 處於虛擬模式時項目集合的計數。

trans-unit.source: Value of '{1}' is not valid for '{0}'. {0} should be greater than or equal to 0.

trans-unit.source: The text that is shown when the mouse hovers over this tab.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the background is drawn using visual styles, if supported.

trans-unit.source: TableBegin() must be called before using this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法之前，必須先呼叫 TableBegin()。

trans-unit.source: No table is currently being printing. TableBegin() has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有任何資料表正在列印。尚未呼叫 TableBegin()。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the appearance of cell borders in a table.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料表中儲存格框線的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Additional Rows or Columns cannot be created. TableLayoutPanel is full and GrowStyle is 'FixedSize'.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立其他資料列或資料行。TableLayoutPanel 已滿而且 GrowStyle 為 'FixedSize'。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a TableLayoutPanel will expand to include new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
trans-unit.target: 表示 TableLayoutPanel 是否在所有現有儲存格已滿時擴充，以納入新的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs repainting.
trans-unit.target: 當儲存格需重新繪製時發生。

trans-unit.source: TableLayoutPanel cannot expand to contain the control, because the panel's GrowStyle property is set to 'FixedSize'.
